languages.text: "Ты про то, как на это отреагирует Винтерскейл? Из того, что я слышала — интересные не то слово! Ничего хорошего ждать точно не стоит".
"You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."
languages.original_text: "Ты про то, как на это отреагирует Винтерскейл? Из того, что я слышала — интересные не то слово! Ничего хорошего ждать точно не стоит".

traits.locale_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你指的是温特斯凯尔的反应吗？就我对他的了解而言，他的反应恐怕远远不是什么‘有趣’！不管这么说，接下来的事情恐怕没什么好期待的。”
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是温特斯凯尔的反应吗？就我对他的了解而言，他的反应恐怕远远不是什么‘有趣’！不管这么说，接下来的事情恐怕没什么好期待的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voulez parler de la réaction de Winterscale ? D'après ce que j'ai entendu dire de lui, "intéressant" n'est pas le mot le plus approprié ! Je n'ai pas hâte de voir ce que ça va donner. Personne ne devrait avoir hâte. »
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez parler de la réaction de Winterscale ? D'après ce que j'ai entendu dire de lui, "intéressant" n'est pas le mot le plus approprié ! Je n'ai pas hâte de voir ce que ça va donner. Personne ne devrait avoir hâte. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Te refieres a cómo reaccionará Winterscale? ¡Por lo que he oído decir de él, creo que "interesante" no es la palabra adecuada! Desde luego, no será nada bueno».
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te refieres a cómo reaccionará Winterscale? ¡Por lo que he oído decir de él, creo que "interesante" no es la palabra adecuada! Desde luego, no será nada bueno».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケールはこの事態にどう反応すると思うの？私が聞いたところによると、”おもしろい”なんて的を得ていないわ！どう転んでも楽しみなんてないのだから」
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケールはこの事態にどう反応すると思うの？私が聞いたところによると、”おもしろい”なんて的を得ていないわ！どう転んでも楽しみなんてないのだから」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr meint, wie Winterzunder darauf reagieren wird? Nach allem, was ich von ihm gehört habe, ist 'interessant' wohl kaum das richtige Wort! Es ist jedenfalls nichts, worauf man sich freuen kann."
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr meint, wie Winterzunder darauf reagieren wird? Nach allem, was ich von ihm gehört habe, ist 'interessant' wohl kaum das richtige Wort! Es ist jedenfalls nichts, worauf man sich freuen kann."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

languages.text: "Winterscale'in vereceği tepkiyi mi kastediyorsun? Kendisi hakkında duyduklarımı düşününce "enteresan olacak" demek yanlış olur. Dört gözle beklenecek şeyler yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: "You mean how Winterscale will react to this? From what I've heard of him, 'interesting' isn't the word! It's nothing to look forward to, at any rate."

traits.locale_text: "Winterscale'in vereceği tepkiyi mi kastediyorsun? Kendisi hakkında duyduklarımı düşününce "enteresan olacak" demek yanlış olur. Dört gözle beklenecek şeyler yaşanmayacak."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
